suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Required by the S3 file storage adapter

suggest.guzzlehttp/psr7: Required by the guzzle http client adapter

suggest.league/flysystem: Required by the flysystem storage adapter
suggest.mailgun/mailgun-php: Required by the mailgun mail adapter
suggest.paragonie/paseto: Required by the paseto token encoder and decoder
suggest.pda/pheanstalk: Required by the pheanstalk message queue
suggest.php-amqplib/php-amqplib: Required by the amqp message queue
suggest.phpseclib/phpseclib: Required by the phpseclib file transport
suggest.psr/cache: Required by the psr cache adapter
suggest.swiftmailer/swiftmailer: Required by the swiftmailer mail adapter
suggest.symfony/console: Required by the common console component
suggest.symfony/event-dispatcher: Required by the common console component
suggest.symfony/finder: Required by the configuration file loaders
suggest.symfony/filesystem: Required by the symfony filesystem adapter and cron manager
suggest.symfony/mercure: Required by the mercure notification publisher
suggest.symfony/messenger: Required by the symfony messenger command bus and event dispatcher
